title: The Runner
description: A New Orleans politician finds his idealistic plans for rebuilding after a toxic oil spill unraveling thanks to a sex scandal.

title: Hell and Back
description: When best friends break a blood oath, one of them is cast away to hell, and the other two must save him from the misfits of the underworld.

description: Battle-scarred stand-up comedian Marc Maron unleashes a storm of ideas about meditation, mortality, documentary films and our weird modern world.

description: In the grim Alaskan winter, a naturalist hunts for wolves blamed for killing a local boy, but he soon finds himself swept into a chilling mystery.

description: Maya finally hooks up with her online dream girl, only to discover she’s deeply involved with an older sugar daddy – a man Maya knows all too well.

description: In rural Louisiana, a terse loner forges a redemptive bond with a woman he saved from a killer, but a violent past soon catches up with both of them.

description: As kids, they escaped a UFO death cult. Now, two adult brothers seek answers after an old videotape surfaces and brings them back to where they began.

description: Longstanding family conflicts resurface when a former model who's been in and out of rehab for a decade returns home for her sister's wedding.

description: A menacing, unseen force stalks a young girl living by herself in a suburban house, where she's surrounded by reminders of her once-happy family.

description: On Halloween night, inside a dilapidated apartment building, Art the Clown stalks his victims, slicing and slaughtering in terrifying silence.

description: A grieving mother takes a road trip with her friend to confront the man who, she believes, stole her late son's business idea to get rich.

title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
description: When some friends visit a vandalized graveyard, they come upon a chainsaw-wielding maniac, and it's a fight to the bloody death between good and evil.
A farmer pens a confession admitting to his wife's murder, but her death is just the beginning of a macabre tale. Based on Stephen King's novella.

description: The getaway driver in a botched robbery puts his skills and smarts to the test when he receives shocking orders from an unknown caller.

description: There's no subject too dark as the comedian skewers taboos and riffs on national tragedies before pulling back the curtain on his provocative style.

description: When a wise-guy podcaster interviews a disabled seafarer, he decides to embark on a transformational quest to track down a dangerous walrus-monster.

title: Life After Beth
description: Following the death of his beloved girlfriend, Beth, Zach is first shattered and then overjoyed when she inexplicably comes back to life.

title: Obvious Child
description: After being fired from her job and dumped by her cheating boyfriend, a comedian has a one-night stand. Weeks later, she finds out she's pregnant.

title: Short Term 12
description: A new charge at a foster care facility dredges up the memories of a young supervisor's own troubled past, and her tough exterior begins eroding.

title: The Adderall Diaries
description: Author Stephen Elliott has a problem separating his own life from incidents in the life of a convicted murderer about whom he's writing a book.

title: The Spectacular Now
description: Classmates Aimee and Sutter form an unlikely friendship, and after helping Aimee raise her social confidence, Sutter begins falling for his creation.

title: Rebirth
description: Long-lost buddy Zack gets suburban dad Kyle on a bus to a Rebirth seminar, sending him down a rabbit hole of psychodrama, seduction and violence.

title: To the Bone
description: Ellen, a 20-year-old with anorexia nervosa, goes on a harrowing, sometimes funny journey of self-discovery at a group home run by an unusual doctor.

title: Creep
description: When a cash-strapped videographer takes a job in a remote mountain town, he finds that the client has some unsettling ideas in mind.

title: How It Ends
description: When a mysterious disaster turns the country into a war zone, a young lawyer heads west with his future father-in-law to find his pregnant fiancée.

title: Kevin Hart: Let Me Explain
description: Philadelphia funnyman Kevin Hart takes the stage in front of a sold-out crowd at Madison Square Garden, part of his hit "Let Me Explain" world tour.

title: Smart People
description: An unexpected romance and a surprise visit from his wild brother turn the life of widowed professor Lawrence Wetherhold upside down.

title: Frozen River
description: On a Mohawk reservation on the Canadian border, Ray Eddy teams with a widowed tribe member to smuggle illegal immigrants into the United States.

title: Kill the Irishman
description: This true crime tale charts the rise and fall of mobster Danny Greene, who faced down the Mafia to gain control of organized crime in 1970s Cleveland.

title: Mean Streets
description: In New York's Little Italy, a low-level hoodlum wrestles with loyalty to his mobster uncle, his faith and his friendship with an inveterate gambler.

title: Rain Man
description: A fast-talking yuppie is forced to slow down when he meets the brother he never knew he had, an unusually gifted autistic savant named Raymond.

title: Swordfish
description: Determined to get his mitts on $9 billion in a secret DEA account so he can fight terrorism, a rogue agent recruits an encryption expert to hack in.

title: Taxi Driver
description: Enraged by New York's moral rot and urban decay, an unhinged cab driver goes mad, plotting an assassination and saving a teen sex worker.

title: The Book of Eli
description: Determined to protect a sacred text that promises to save humanity, Eli goes on a quest westward across the barren, postapocalyptic country.

title: Who's That Knocking at My Door?
description: A woman's revelation that she was once raped sends her boyfriend, a reformed street thug, into an emotional and spiritual tailspin.

title: Duck Butter
description: Wary of dishonesty in relationships, two young women embark on a 24-hour experiment on intimacy, but their romance flounders as the clock winds down.

title: Melvin Goes to Dinner
description: When Melvin and his friends gather for dinner, their casual conversation takes a sharp turn as they begin to disclose raw truths about themselves.

title: Here Alone
description: When she finally encounters two other survivors, a woman alone in a world decimated by a zombie epidemic struggles to trust her new companions.

title: The Conjuring
description: Based on true events, this spine-chiller tells the story of a New England family who begins having encounters with spirits in their farmhouse.

title: A Ghost Story
description: Following a fatal car crash, a man's spirit remains stuck in the home he shared with his wife as doors into the past and future begin to open.

title: Todd Glass: Act Happy
description: Try to keep up as comedian Todd Glass delivers rapid-fire stand-up that bounces from his heart attack to his coming out to how to eat a Kit Kat.

title: The Open House
description: Following a tragedy, a mother and her teen son move to a relative's vacant vacation home, where eerie and unexplained forces conspire against them.

title: Neal Brennan: 3 Mics
description: Wicked one-liners and soul-baring confessions converge in this uniquely intimate stand-up special from "Chappelle's Show" co-creator Neal Brennan.

title: Roger Corman's Death Race 2050
description: In this dystopian sequel, kills equal points in a violently gory annual cross-country road race sponsored by the United Corporations of America.

title: Deadcon
description: A group of uber-popular, social media influencers’ trip to a digital media festival grows dark when an evil spirit wants to lure them to their demise.

title: Jezebel
description: During the internet's infancy, a vulnerable woman follows her sister into the sex industry as a webcam model but her sudden popularity tests their bond.

title: Dallas Buyers Club
description: Refusing to accept a death sentence from his doctor after being diagnosed with AIDS in 1986, Ron Woodroof smuggles medications from abroad.

title: Saving Zoë
description: A reserved high school freshman acts out when she recovers a diary that offers clues to a secret world that could be behind her sister's murder.

title: The Brave
description: With entry into the European Union at stake, Albania must rely on a mash-up of elite cops to take down a slippery drug lord dominating its economy.

title: Face 2 Face
description: Two former friends, who now live far apart, learn about each other's insecurities and secrets over a series of video chats.

title: Teenage Cocktail
description: Two teen girls form an intense bond and launch a lucrative webcam business, leading them to a dangerous encounter with a middle-aged married man.

title: Leslie Jones: Time Machine
description: From trying to seduce Prince to battling sleep apnea, Leslie Jones traces her evolution as an adult in a joyfully raw and outrageous stand-up special.

title: The Master
description: A heavy-drinking loner finds some semblance of a family when he stumbles onto the ship of Lancaster Dodd, the charismatic leader of a new "religion."

title: Camp X-Ray
description: Fresh Army recruit Amy Cole is assigned to Guantanamo Bay's Camp X-Ray, where she forms a surprising bond with one of the prisoners in her charge.

title: The Last Face
description: Savage civil war and a dispute over humanitarian assistance threaten to unravel a checkered romance between an aid director and a doctor.

title: 13 Sins
description: A man agrees to appear on a game show with a $6 million prize. But as the challenges become more extreme, he realizes he's made a grave mistake.

title: The Fighter
description: After a string of defeats, a boxer rediscovers his fighting will with help from his trainer and half-brother, a once-talented pugilist.

title: He's Out There
description: While vacationing at a remote lake house, a mother and her daughters become pawns in the twisted game of an ax-wielding psychopath.

title: Tom Segura: Disgraceful
description: Tom Segura gives voice to the sordid thoughts you'd never say out loud, with blunt musings on porn, parking lot power struggles, parenthood and more.

title: The Last Laugh
description: After moving to a retirement home, restless talent manager Al reconnects with long-ago client Buddy and coaxes him back out on the comedy circuit.

title: Dayveon
description: Following the shooting death of his older brother, a depressed and aimless 13-year-old boy falls in with a gang in rural Arkansas.

title: The Evil Dead
description: During a stop at a remote cabin deep within the woods, a group of teens begins turning into flesh-eating zombies in director Sam Raimi's cult classic.

title: American Beauty
description: While struggling to endure his tightly wound wife, an unfulfilling job and a surly teen, a man becomes obsessed with one of his daughter's friends.

title: Chasing Amy
description: Comic book artist Holden meets the perfect woman, only to learn that she's a lesbian. But that doesn't stop him from falling in love with her.

title: Donnie Brasco
description: When FBI agent Joe Pistone goes undercover to infiltrate the mob, he starts to identify with the made men he's charged with taking down.

title: Final Destination
description: After narrowly avoiding a fatal plane explosion, a group of seemingly lucky teen classmates finds that Death is not so easily cheated.

title: Friday the 13th
description: A group of teenage camp counselors raises the ire of Jason Voorhees, a masked, homicidal maniac, in this remake of the classic slasher flick.

title: Magnolia
description: Through chance, human action, past history and divine intervention, an eclectic cast of characters weaves and warps through each other's lives.

title: Paranormal Activity
description: When Katie and Micah fear their home may be haunted by a demonic presence, Micah sets up a video camera to document all the action.

title: Patriot Games
description: CIA desk jockey Jack Ryan plunges into the heart of international terrorism after spoiling an assassination attempt on a British royal family member.

title: Riot
description: Seeking vengeance for the murder of his wife, a cop robs a bank in order to be thrown into prison with the Russian kingpin who ruined his life.

title: Scary Movie
description: The Wayans brothers spoof some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, including Scream, I Know What You Did Last Summer, The Matrix and American Pie.

title: Seal Team Six: The Raid on Osama Bin Laden
description: In this dramatic recreation, U.S. Navy SEAL Team 6 trains for a critical mission, then executes a tough nighttime raid on Osama Bin Laden's compound.

title: Siren
description: A groom-to-be and his pals celebrate with a debauched night out that ends with a supernatural assault by a stripper who is not what she appears to be.

title: The Amityville Horror
description: This hair-raising remake of the 1979 horror hit depicts the ordeal of the Lutz family, whose new home has a gory past and a legacy of demons.

title: The Craft
description: At a Catholic school, a new girl falls in with a clique of teen witches who wield their powers against anyone who crosses them, even their parents.

title: The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning
description: The mischievous Duke boys, Bo and Luke, are sent to live with their Uncle Jesse and cousin Daisy in this prequel movie to the popular TV series.

title: The Final Destination
description: Nick O'Bannon thinks he's cheated death when he keeps a grisly premonition from becoming reality, but he soon realizes that fate has other plans.

title: The Original Kings of Comedy
description: Director Spike Lee documents the last night of the hit comedy tour featuring comics Steve Harvey, Cedric the Entertainer, D.L. Hughley and Bernie Mac.

title: The Peacemaker
description: After terrorists trigger a nuclear blast in Russia, a U.S. Special Forces intelligence agent and a nuclear weapons expert come to the rescue.

title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
description: A charming sociopath maneuvers into the lush life of a young heir. But as he embraces the posh lifestyle, he'll stop at nothing to hold onto it.

title: Up in the Air
description: Ryan Bingham flies around the country firing employees on behalf of companies, but he faces losing the job he savors to recent college grad Natalie.

title: Hell or High Water
description: In a desperate bid to save their family ranch, two brothers stage a series of clever bank robberies with a pair of Texas Rangers in hot pursuit.

title: Jersey Boys
description: Adapted from the hit Broadway musical, this nostalgic look at the Four Seasons and their bumpy offstage lives stretches across four decades.

title: Krystal
description: A kid with a heart condition falls for an ex-stripper with a lot of baggage and joins her Alcoholics Anonymous group to catch her attention.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: This stylized crime caper weaves together stories featuring a burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner and a washed-up boxer.

title: Tears of the Sun
description: A Navy SEAL is sent to a war-torn African jungle to rescue a doctor, only to realize he must also save the refugees in the physician's care.

title: Happy Hunting
description: On the run from his meth-dealing employers, a drifter with a drinking problem becomes prey in a desert town's twisted hunting contest.

title: Super Dark Times
description: A tragic accident drives a wedge between two teenage boys, threatening a friendship that had seemed firm and unshakeable.

title: High Flying Bird
description: When an NBA lockout sidelines his big rookie client, an agent hatches a bold plan to save their careers – and disrupt the league's power structure.

title: Lila & Eve
description: After each of them loses a child to murder, two women who meet in a support group initiate their own investigation when the police are no help.

title: Ray Romano: Right Here, Around the Corner
description: Ray Romano cut his stand-up teeth at the Comedy Cellar in New York. Now, in his first comedy special in 23 years, he returns to where it all began.

title: Princess Cyd
description: A teenager moves to Chicago for the summer and finds a poignant mentor in her aunt and a sweet love interest in a girl who works in the neighborhood.

title: The Cloverfield Paradox
description: Orbiting above a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

title: Thumper
description: After moving to a hardscrabble suburban California town, a young woman becomes dangerously entangled with a local drug enterprise.

title: Hannibal Buress: Comedy Camisado
description: In a special packed with stealthy humor, Hannibal Buress tackles zipper etiquette, the legacy of steroids and the fallout from his Bill Cosby routine.

title: The Charnel House
description: After an architect transforms a slaughterhouse into trendy lofts, its new inhabitants discover that the structure is haunted by its evil past.

title: Imperial Dreams
description: A young father returns home from jail eager to care for his son and become a writer, but crime, poverty and a flawed system threaten his plans.

title: Mike Birbiglia: Thank God for Jokes
description: Comedian Mike Birbiglia takes the stage in Brooklyn and hits on hard truths about puppets, late people and the very real dangers of being funny.

title: Our Idiot Brother
description: A seemingly clueless idealist relies on his exasperated sisters for shelter and support after his girlfriend dumps him and his dog is taken away.

title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore
description: A timid nursing assistant gets a new lease on life when she and a neighborhood loner track down the degenerates who broke into her house.

title: Paddleton
description: After he's diagnosed with terminal cancer, middle-aged Michael asks his neighbor friend Andy to help him end his life before the disease does.

title: Trash Fire
description: Surprise news that his girlfriend is pregnant sends loutish Owen on an ill-advised trip to reconnect with his twisted sister and sadistic grandmother.

title: Blood Money
description: Three friends on a wilderness trip find bags full of cash and must evade the criminal who hid the money in the first place.

title: Kill Ratio
description: Posing as a telecom salesman at a business conference, a CIA agent fights to protect a fledgling Eastern European democracy from a military coup.

title: The Super
description: When an ex-cop becomes a superintendent of an apartment building, he suspects the sinister janitor is behind the eerie disappearances of its tenants.

title: Irreplaceable You
description: A stunning cancer diagnosis spurs Abbie to seek a future girlfriend for fiancé and childhood sweetheart Sam, who's clueless when it comes to dating.

title: Milk
description: Sean Penn stars in this biopic about Harvey Milk, the openly gay San Francisco politician who was murdered by a disgruntled city supervisor in 1978.

title: The Detained
description: Five high school students serving Saturday detention in a former corrections facility must find a way to outsmart an unseen menace out to kill them.

title: Ken Jeong: You Complete Me, Ho
description: In his first-ever stand-up special, Ken Jeong pays tribute to his wife and shares stories about Hollywood and how "The Hangover" saved his life.

title: Chris Rock: Tamborine
description: Chris Rock takes the stage in Brooklyn for a comedy special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and American politics.

title: We the Animals
description: A trio of brothers cope with their parents' volatile relationship by running wild and unchecked, and one of them experiences a visceral awakening.

title: Velvet Buzzsaw
description: A feared critic, an icy gallery owner and an ambitious assistant snap up a recently deceased artist's stash of paintings – with dire consequences.

title: Paint It Black
description: In the wake of a young artist’s suicide, his pianist mother and his despairing girlfriend square off in a living nightmare beset by guilt and blame.

title: Indiscretion
description: After a weekend fling with artist Victor, Veronica, a psychiatrist and politician's wife, becomes the target of Victor's dangerous romantic obsession.

title: It Comes at Night
description: As danger stalks the world outside his isolated home, an overprotective father faces a tough decision when another family shows up seeking help.

title: El Camino Christmas
description: Stuck in a liquor store during an alleged robbery, a group of strangers shares hidden truths and forms an unexpected bond on Christmas Eve.

title: Kickboxer: Vengeance
description: After a skilled fighter falls in the ring, his younger brother emerges from the shadows to train and get revenge against a brutal champion.

title: Blue Jay
description: Two former high school sweethearts unexpectedly reunite in their old hometown, where they rediscover their magical bond and face a shared regret.

title: The Good Neighbor
description: Two tech-savvy teens plot to fool a cranky old neighbor into believing his house is haunted, but their cruel prank soon takes some unexpected turns.

title: Child's Play
description: When a rash of murders unfolds, 6-year-old Andy knows that his toy doll Chucky is the killer, but neither his mom nor the cops believe him.

title: Dog Eat Dog
description: A delusional ex-con rejoins his unhinged former partners for one last job: kidnap the baby of a mobster's enemy for ransom.

title: Anesthesia
description: After a popular professor is attacked on a New York street, the story of how a series of intertwined events led to the life-altering assault unfolds.

title: Silencer
description: When a drug lord kidnaps his girlfriend’s daughter, a retired assassin leaves his newly peaceful life to go on a ruthless rampage to rescue the child.

title: Lawless
description: This true-to-life action saga profiles Virginia's bootlegging Bondurant brothers, whose exploits during the Prohibition era made them outlaw heroes.

title: Shelter
description: A forensic psychiatrist has to think outside the box when she takes on a patient whose multiple personalities lead to a trail of murder victims.

title: Doom: Annihilation
description: When a swarm of soul-stealing demons invades a Martian moon, a group of elite space Marines must obliterate the beasts to save Earth.

title: Creep 2
description: A video artist finds the perfect character for a sensational piece, but the subject of her dreams soon reveals his insidious side.

title: Bright
description: In an LA rife with interspecies tensions, a human cop and his orc partner stumble on a powerful object and become embroiled in a prophesied turf war.

title: Bird Box
description: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a survivor and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

title: Some Freaks
description: A one-eyed boy and plus-sized girl form a deep connection. But following a brief separation, they reunite as different people.

title: Kill the Messenger
description: In the 1980s, a crusading journalist uncovers secret CIA funding for Nicaraguan rebels, but the powers that be silence his investigation.

title: Barry
description: A young Barack Obama forges his identity while dealing with race, divergent cultures and ordinary life as a New York City college student.

title: 6 Underground
description: After faking his death, a tech billionaire recruits a team of international operatives for a bold and bloody mission to take down a brutal dictator.

title: Judd Apatow: The Return
description: Judd Apatow returns to stand-up comedy after 25 years, riffing on living with three women, amusing moments from his career and much more.

title: Michelle Wolf: Joke Show
description: Comedian Michelle Wolf takes on outrage culture, massages, childbirth, feminism and much more (like otters) in a stand-up special from New York City.

title: Cut Bank
description: A small-town dreamer is sure he's landed on a gold mine after accidentally filming a murder but is sucked into a violent tale of greed and deception.

title: Hustle & Flow
description: A pimp with aspirations of grandeur wants to make it as a rapper but discovers that fame isn't all it's cracked up to be in this indie drama.

title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
description: This provocative film sheds light on actor-comedian Martin Lawrence's roots, his rise to fame and his walk on the wild side.

title: Primal Fear
description: When a blood-spattered altar boy is found running from a murder scene, his conviction seems certain – but his attorney is determined to win the case.

title: The Departed
description: Two rookie Boston cops are sent deep undercover – one inside the gang of a charismatic Irish mob boss and the other double-crossing his own department.

title: The Tribes of Palos Verdes
description: When a move to an exclusive seaside community sends her mother and twin brother into a downward spiral, teenager Medina finds solace in surfing.

title: Natural Selection
description: As the new kid, a shy high school senior finds himself tormented by all his peers except one. But his new friend has a dark, infectious outlook.

title: St. Agatha
description: Unwed and pregnant, a young woman flees her abusive home in 1950s Georgia and takes refuge at a mysterious convent with a terrible secret.

title: David Cross: Making America Great Again!
description: Cross skewers Donald Trump, religious taboos and American swagger in a provocative night of comedy at the Paramount Theatre in Austin, Texas.

title: Like Father
description: After she's left at the altar, a workaholic advertising executive ends up on her Caribbean honeymoon cruise with her estranged father.

title: Dave Chappelle: Sticks & Stones
description: Dave Chappelle takes on gun culture, the opioid crisis and the tidal wave of celebrity scandals in a defiant stand-up special filmed in Atlanta.

title: XOXO
description: The lives of a budding DJ, his loyal pal, a hopeless romantic, a jaded has-been and a troubled couple intersect at an electronic dance music festival.

title: One Last Thing
description: After 25 years of searching, a lonely dentist finds his long-lost daughter but learns that she suffers from a rare medical condition.

title: Death Note
description: Light Turner finds a supernatural notebook and uses it to mete out death, attracting the attention of a detective, a demon and a girl in his class.

title: Concussion
description: A lesbian housewife, feeling trapped in a stale marriage, begins visiting female prostitutes and soon seeks excitement by becoming a sex worker.

title: Emelie
description: A suburban couple hires a new sitter to watch their three kids for the night, unaware that the young woman isn't who she claims to be.

title: Wish I Was Here
description: With his acting career moribund, Aidan Bloom steers a new tack in life, taking over his children's education when private school becomes too costly.

title: Hostiles
description: After a long career battling the Cheyenne, a U.S. Army captain is ordered to safely escort the tribe's most influential chief to his Montana homeland.

title: Brad Paisley's Comedy Rodeo
description: Country music star Brad Paisley hosts a night of music and laughs with comics Nate Bargatze, John Heffron, Jon Reep, Sarah Tiana and Mike E. Winfield.

title: Demonic
description: When amateur ghost hunters visit an abandoned house, their investigation turns into a massacre, leaving questions for a detective and a psychologist.

title: Jackie Brown
description: When an aging flight attendant's caught smuggling cash and forced to help with an investigation, she hatches a clever plan to make off with the dough.

title: Chernobyl Diaries
description: A group of kids takes an illegal tour through an abandoned city near Chernobyl, where mysterious humanoid forms begin to haunt their steps...

title: Flock of Four
description: One night in 1959, four young musicians venture from Pasadena to South-Central Los Angeles in the hopes of hearing a living jazz legend play.

title: The Diabolical
description: Terrorized by unexplained disturbances and horrific visions in her home, a young widowed mother turns to her scientist boyfriend for help.

title: The Informant!
description: While gathering evidence against his employer to help the FBI build a price-fixing case, Mark Whitacre begins to piece together a fantasy world.

title: Hush
description: A deaf writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears in her window.

title: 6 Balloons
description: A loyal sister struggles to stay afloat while driving her heroin-addicted brother to a detox center and looking after his 2-year-old daughter.

title: The Eyes of My Mother
description: At the remote farmhouse where she once witnessed a traumatic childhood event, a young woman develops a grisly fascination with violence.

title: Anthony Jeselnik: Fire in the Maternity Ward
description: Forging his own comedic boundaries, Anthony Jeselnik revels in getting away with saying things others can't in this stand-up special shot in New York.

title: Rodney King
description: Roger Guenveur Smith gives voice to the man at the center of the brutal police beating that helped fuel the 1992 LA riots. Spike Lee directs.

title: Kickboxer: Retaliation
description: Sloan's vow to never return to Thailand is cut short when he's kidnapped and taken to a Thai prison, where he's forced to fight a 400-pound brute.

title: Sand Castle
description: After the invasion of Iraq in 2003, a reluctant soldier's platoon is dispatched on a dangerous mission to repair a hostile village's water system.

title: Dude
description: Four best friends navigate loss and major life changes – and smoke a lot of weed – during their last two weeks of high school.

title: Kevin Hart: Irresponsible
description: As a father of three on his second marriage, Kevin Hart proves that being him is indeed a tall order in a fresh special inspired by his own mistakes.

title: Good Kill
description: As Tommy Egan pilots armed drones over Afghanistan from the safe comfort of Las Vegas, the remote nature of his work begins to raise moral questions.

title: Brampton's Own
description: After 12 years in the minors, a struggling baseball player retires, returns home and faces the last person he struck out with – his ex-girlfriend.

title: Jonathan
description: Two siblings share a body, each getting it for 12 hours a day. But when one of them breaks the rules, their whole way of life comes crashing down.

title: Thriller
description: When a prank goes wrong, a shy kid from Compton is sent away for murder. Four years later, he’s back and out for revenge on homecoming weekend.

title: Band Aid
description: A young married couple tries to save their disintegrating relationship by turning their fights into songs, with the help of an oddball neighbor.

title: Kevin Hart: What Now?
description: Frenetic comic Kevin Hart hits Philadelphia and dishes on suburban wildlife, jean shorts and the fine art of getting even with a 7-year-old.

title: A Dangerous Woman
description: At the center of this engrossing melodrama is a Golden Globe-nominated turn by Debra Winger, who plays a sheltered, slow-witted woman living with her widowed Aunt Frances while working at a dry cleaners.

title: Schindler's List
description: Oskar Schindler becomes an unlikely humanitarian, spending his entire fortune to help save 1,100 Jews from Auschwitz during World War II.

title: Deuces
description: Assigned to go undercover to take down an impenetrable crime ring, a detective finds himself falling under the sway of its enigmatic leader.
